name: 2Survive
description:
The game I made for my honours project at university.

2Survive is a local multiplayer 2D platformer, designed to simulate a series of prisoner’s dilemma games. The players, chained to each other, are tasked with climbing a tower, and are constantly encouraged to both compete and cooperate by all possible interactions as well as the environment itself. The ultimate goal is to free yourself and escape the tower.
